name: FALLEN PIXEL
description:
Welcome to the readme, that you should probably read ;)

This ist the very first playable test for my Game "FALLEN PIXEL"! (v 0.0.1)

STORY (for this little alpha, not for the game):

You are a pixel, which fell out of his screen! To get back to your friends you have to make sure 
there is enough disc_space to save the files for the next level!

So go ahead! Can you find every of the 18 floppy discs?

MOVEMENT:

arrow_left = walk left
arrow_right = walk right
arrow_up = jump

esc = (placeholder) menu

Have fun playing and testing!
Im looking forward to your feedback and suggestions!

Greetings

Alex aka PIXELARCHITECT
